title: Hotel 414 a great experience...
text: My mom and I just returned from 5 days in NY seeing plays, shopping and taking in the sights. 414 Hotel was a great place to stay...VERY ACCOMMODATING! And located near all of the theatres, restaurant row, times square, rockafeller center, 5th Ave shopping....perfect location...we walked everywhere.Mike is the man and can suggest terrific restaurants. The rooms were clean and cozy without being too small...I'd stay here again in a heart-beat.
